extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns the Virus Definitions Date for McAfee VirusScan. This attribute template applies to McAfee VirusScan (v8.0).
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh #This script has been verified to work on McAfee VirusScan (v8.0). #Check to see if McAfee VirusScan is installed if [ -f "/Library/Preferences/com.Mcafee.VirusScan.plist" ]; then result=`/usr/bin/defaults read /Library/Preferences/com.Mcafee.VirusScan Update_DAT_Time | awk '{print $1, $2}'` echo "<result>$result</result>" else echo "<result>Not installed</result>" fi
